fact: Did you know that the 'mantis shrimp' has the most complex eyes known so far in the animal kingdom, with 12 to 16 types of photoreceptors compared to humans' three?
didYouKnow: This incredible visual system allows them to see ultraviolet, visible, and polarized light, as well as perceive depth with exceptional accuracy. Their eyes are also capable of detecting circular polarized light, a feat unmatched by any other animal.
